title: Golang Epoch Time
description: The Epoch challenge is a Golang challenge that aims to test your ability to get the number of seconds, milliseconds, or nanoseconds since the Unix epoch.

meta.title: Golang Epoch Time Challenge
meta.description: Learn how to get the number of seconds, milliseconds, or nanoseconds since the Unix epoch using Golang.
meta.keywords: unix epoch, go playground, epoch time, go, golang, go labs, go playground online, time manipulation, programming challenge, go lab

verify.name: Verify Epoch Timestamp Output Correctness
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
